title: New: Attu – Don’t Sleep
content:
Photo: Hollie Fernando

Having grown from the solo project of Stefan Antoinette to a fully fledged four piece, London’s Attu have returned with Don’t Sleep, the first single to be taken from their debut EP. A cleaner and more polished sound, it’s dreamy, whilst remaining engaging, not just simply floating by. The initial collection of tracks (A,B,C & D) felt like the trailer to something rather special, and Don’t Sleep begins to bring the early potential to a form of realisation. Thanks to DIY for the premiere.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
